trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event occurs just before a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: L' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>evento si verifica immediatamente prima della chiusura di un form, da parte dell'utente, tramite l'interfaccia utente (UI), o a livello di programmazione tramite le chiamate ai metodi, ad esempio <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A>in una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>classe o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A>nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: Se un form dispone di un form figlio o proprietà, un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>evento viene generato anche per ciascuno di essi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosing>

trans-unit.source: If any one of the forms cancels the event, none of the forms are closed.
trans-unit.target: Se uno dei formati Annulla l'evento, nessuno dei moduli vengono chiusi.

trans-unit.source: Therefore the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> events are not sent to any of the forms.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto corrispondente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>gli eventi non vengono inviati a una delle forme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosingEventArgs class provides data for this event.
trans-unit.target: La classe FormClosingEventArgs fornisce dati per questo evento.

trans-unit.source: Two important members are the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> properties.
The event can be canceled by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to true.
trans-unit.target: L'evento può essere annullato impostando la <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà su true.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides a reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>proprietà fornisce il motivo per cui il form viene chiuso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The `closeReason` and `cancel` parameters are used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Il `closeReason` e `cancel` parametri vengono utilizzati per inizializzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà, rispettivamente.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> valore che indica il motivo per cui il form viene chiuso.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cancel the event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per annullare l'evento. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form is being closed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica perché il form viene chiuso.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>può essere chiusa a causa di una serie di motivi, avviata dall'utente sia a livello di codice.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The CloseReason property indicates a reason for the closure.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà CloseReason indica il motivo della chiusura.
